summary: Implemented Google OAuth 2.0 authentication for teachers with role-based authorization. Created AuthenticationService to handle user creation/retrieval from Google OAuth claims with automatic Teacher role assignment. Set up Google OAuth configuration in Program.cs with cookie authentication for session persistence. Created Login page with styled "Sign in with Google" button, Logout page, and AuthController to handle OAuth endpoints (/api/auth/login, /api/auth/callback, /api/auth/logout). Configured cascading authentication state and AuthorizeRouteView for protected routes. Added RedirectToLogin component for unauthenticated access handling. Updated MainLayout with auth-aware navigation header showing user name and sign out link. Made Home.razor a protected page requiring authentication.
deviations: Could not run dotnet build to verify compilation because dotnet CLI is not available in the current environment. The code follows ASP.NET Core and Blazor patterns and should compile correctly.
